message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $85. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with this price.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $85. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $82. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not at the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $78 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $79. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with this deal.
I'm getting close to the price I'm comfortable with, but I'm still not there yet. I'm willing to pay $76 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm almost there, Bob! I can offer it to you for $78. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with this deal.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still not at the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
